title: wine_Heartland_2013_One_Red_(Langhorne_Creek)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 59984.
country: Australia.
description: This is a throwback to those brash, flavor-exuding Aussie wines of the past. Flashy, sweet-scented oak (think maple syrup and toasted coconut) marks the nose, while concentrated cassis and vanilla flavors coat the palate. This is big, but gorgeously so, with velvety-rich tannins and a long, plush finish. No, there's nothing subtle about this blend of 60% Cabernet and 40% Shiraz, but sometimes subtlety is overrated. Drink nowâ€“2030..
designation: One.
